segments.en: “Mendicants, an eon contains four uncountable periods.

segments.pli: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṃvaṭṭati, taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ—
segments.en: When an eon contracts, it’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
segments.en: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.

segments.pli: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṃvaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ—
segments.en: When an eon remains fully contracted, it’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
segments.en: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.

segments.pli: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭati, taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ—
segments.en: When an eon expands, it’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
segments.en: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.

segments.pli: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ—
segments.en: When an eon remains fully expanded, it’s not easy to calculate

segments.pli: ettakāni vassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatānīti vā, ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā, ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā.
segments.en: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti.
segments.en: These are the four uncountable periods of an eon.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, an eon contains four uncountable periods.

suttaplex.blurb: It’s not easy to measure the length of an eon.
